item.description:
The India Association of Greater Boston is having its annual India Day celebrations on 16 Aug. The event usually features dance and music performances, and there'll also be plenty of stalls selling Indian food. I'm told this is a big Indian event in Boston, drawing about 12000 people!

The event begins at 15:30 with some kids' performances, but we'll skip those and meet at 17:30 in the vicinity of the Hatch Shell.

Info: http://www.iagb.org/...
item.name: India Day
